UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Effects of lactoferrin derived peptides on simulants of biological warfare agents.
Literature.Author: Sijbrandij T, Ligtenberg AJ, Nazmi K, Veerman EC, Bolscher JG, Bikker FJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus atrophaeus BM013(MBC=1.6µM),Bacillus cereus BM629(MBC=0.8µM),Yersinia enterocolitica DSM 4780(MBC=0.8µM),Yersinia pseudotuberculosis DSM 8992(no activity data),Salmonella typhimurium SF1399(MBC=1.6µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium DT104a(MBC=1.6µM)
